-- | Enumerator instances for monads-fd classes
--   
--   Enumerator instances for monads-fd classes
@package enumerator-fd
@version 0.1.0.2


-- | Enumerator instances for monads-fd classes
module Data.Enumerator.Instances.FD
instance MonadWriter w m => MonadWriter w (Iteratee a m)
instance MonadState s m => MonadState s (Iteratee a m)
instance MonadReader r m => MonadReader r (Iteratee a m)
instance MonadRWS r w s m => MonadRWS r w s (Iteratee a m)
instance Monad m => MonadError SomeException (Iteratee a m)
instance MonadCont m => MonadCont (Iteratee a m)
